description: DUNKERTON - Iowa --- The arrest Wednesday of the city's mayor and his nephew for allegedly interfering with a police officer during a traffic stop garnered varied reactions - ranging from sharp criticism from some city officials to unwavering support from some residents.
html: Mayor's arrest rattles Dunkerton

description: DUNKERTON - Iowa --- The mayor of Dunkerton approached the town's part-time police officer rapidly and got within arms' reach during a December traffic stop - according to investigators with the Black Hawk County Sheriff's Office.
html: NEW DETAILS: Dunkerton mayor - nephew face charges in ticket dispute

description: DUNKERTON - Iowa --- Citizens came out in force Monday to support Dunkerton's police officers as Mayor Mike Schares explores disbanding the department.
html: UPDATE: Dunkerton residents disapprove of disbanding police department

description: DUNKERTON --- Days after a blowup with the city's part-time police officer - Mayor Mike Schares started the process to possibly eliminate Dunkerton's police department.
html: Dunkerton mayor eyed eliminating police force

description: DUNKERTON - Iowa --- Law enforcement officials are investigating an incident involving a minor traffic violation that escalated into allegations of abuse of power by Mayor Mike Schares.
html: Probe centers on alleged firing of Dunkerton cop over traffic stop
